name: Generally Relative Space Golf
description:
Basically golf in space! (⛳👨‍🚀)

 Features
  • Cool gravity shenanigans
  • 30 gorgeous maps
  • A live generated soundtrack
 Soundtrack  Less important stuff

Press F12 to open settings.

Generally Relative Space Golf was designed to be played in virtual reality. If you have access an Oculus Quest please consider trying out the VR version.

Generally Relative Golf uses the absolutely gorgeous Space Mono font.

 Changelog

Version 1.0

  • Initial release.
